name: Poeli Pass
description:
Description:
Poeli (Po - Lee) Pass is a game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. It's a game about a die that rolls himself to pick a color of 6. Depending on that color, makes it so it changes what he can stand on. If the color is the same as what Poeli is, he can walk on it, if not, he will pass through it. Poeli can always walk on white and will die to black.

   Controls:
Keyboard and mouse only
A and D to move left and right
Space to jump; the jump is variable and will change with the amount of time you hold the key
Press P to pause

   Software Used:
Unity
Github
FL Studio
BFXR
Aseprite
Photoshop

   Soundtrack:
https://soundcloud.com/drreww/sets/poeli-pass

   Team:
Charre - Artist, Sound Designer, Level Designer
Drreww - Programmer, Composer

   Special Thanks:
Pat - Bug testing
Kevin - Game Idea
